StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetSector]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@zipCode varchar(5) = NULL, @orgUnitId int, @ProspectId uniqueiden..er AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @SECTORID uniqueiden..er = null DECLARE @SECTORDESIGNATOR VARCHAR(10) = null DECLARE @CONTRACTID int = null DECLARE @CONTRACTSECTOR varchar(2) = null
--Check if ProspectId has associated Contract(sector)data, and if so use sector value from Contract table SELECT @SECTORID = SectorID, @CONTRACTID = contract_id, @CONTRACTSECTOR = Con.Sector FROM MCRISS.DBO.CONTRACT CON JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA NWA ON CON.NWA_ID = NWA.NWA_ID JOIN USMC.Prospect PRO ON NWA.rowguid = PRO.NwaId WHERE PRO.ProspectId = @PROSPECTID --WHERE PRO.NwaId = @NWAID IF @SECTORID IS NOT NULL BEGIN SELECT @SECTORDESIGNATOR = MS.SectorDesignator FROM RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSector MS WHERE MS.SECTORID = @SECTORID END -- SELECT @SECTORID AS SectorId, @SECTORDESIGNATOR AS SectorValue IF @SECTORID is null and @CONTRACTID is not null BEGIN --There are some Contracts where the sectorID is null. Complica.ng things is that there can be a mismatch between sectorID (null) and sector (not null). -- We need to .gure out what we need to do here and we need to modify the InsertContract procedure. if @CONTRACTSECTOR is not null BEGIN set @SECTORDESIGNATOR = @CONTRACTSECTOR END ELSE BEGIN set @SECTORDESIGNATOR = 'OA' END
END ELSE BEGIN --Else calculate sector value based on Prospect's Current zip code upon Recrui.ngPersonId and Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId IF @SECTORID is null BEGIN SELECT TOP 1 @SECTORID = MSZ.SectorID FROM USMC.PROSPECT PRO inner JOIN USMC.PersonAddress PA ON PRO.PersonID = PA.PersonId inner JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorZip MSZ ON PA.zipcode = MSZ.ZIP inner join RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorRecruiter MSR on MSR.SectorID = MSZ.SectorID AND pro.recrui.ngpersonid = msr.recrui.ngpersonid INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSector ms ON msz.SectorID = ms.SectorID AND pro.recrui.ngorganiza.onid = ms.recrui.ngorganiza.onid WHERE PRO.ProspectId = @PROSPECTID and PA.personaddresstypeid=1 ORDER BY msr.LastUpdateDate desc
IF @SECTORID IS NOT NULL BEGIN SELECT @SECTORDESIGNATOR = MS.SectorDesignator FROM RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSector MS WHERE MS.SECTORID = @SECTORID END ELSE BEGIN SELECT TOP 1 @SECTORID = MSZ.SectorID FROM USMC.PROSPECT PRO inner JOIN USMC.PersonAddress PA ON PRO.PersonID = PA.PersonId inner JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorZip MSZ ON PA.zipcode = MSZ.ZIP inner join RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSector MS on MS.SectorID = MSZ.SectorID AND pro.recrui.ngorganiza.onid = ms.recrui.ngorganiza.onid WHERE PRO.ProspectId = @PROSPECTID and PA.personaddresstypeid=1 ORDER BY msz.LastUpdateDate desc
IF @SECTORID IS NOT NULL BEGIN SELECT @SECTORDESIGNATOR = MS.SectorDesignator FROM RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSector MS WHERE MS.SECTORID = @SECTORID END END END END IF @SECTORDESIGNATOR IS NULL BEGIN SET @SECTORDESIGNATOR = 'OA' END SELECT @SECTORDESIGNATOR
-- SELECT SectorDesignator -- FROM RSSOSS.usmc.mapsSectorZip msz -- INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSector ms -- ON ms.SectorID = msz.SectorID inner join vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on org -- on org.OrgUnitId = @orgUnitId and org.rowguid = ms.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId -- WHERE zip = @zipCode
END
